statements: SELECT * FROM HistoricalLandmarks;
SELECT landmark_name, location FROM HistoricalLandmarks WHERE year_established > 1800;
SELECT id, landmark_name, location, year_established FROM HistoricalLandmarks WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM HistoricalLandmarks WHERE year_established BETWEEN 1700 AND 1800;
SELECT landmark_name AS name, historical_significance AS significance FROM HistoricalLandmarks;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalLandmarks WHERE year_established > 1800 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT landmark_name, year_established FROM HistoricalLandmarks WHERE historical_significance LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY year_established DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_landmarks FROM HistoricalLandmarks;
SELECT landmark_name, location FROM HistoricalLandmarks WHERE location LIKE '%New%' AND year_established < 1900;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM HistoricalLandmarks;
SELECT * FROM Landmarks WHERE historical_period = 'Ancient';
SELECT landmark_name, location FROM Landmarks ORDER BY landmark_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM Landmarks;
SELECT landmark_name FROM Landmarks WHERE heritage_status = 'Protected' AND location = 'Rome';
SELECT site_name, preservation_type FROM PreservationSites WHERE preservation_status = 'Under Review';
SELECT landmark_name, location FROM Landmarks WHERE historical_period = 'Medieval'
SELECT * FROM PreservationSites WHERE preservation_type = 'Conservation' AND preservation_status = 'Under Review'
SELECT site_name, location, preservation_type FROM PreservationSites WHERE preservation_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY site_name ASC
SELECT landmark_name, historical_period FROM Landmarks WHERE location = 'Rome' OR location = 'Athens' ORDER BY historical_period DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_landmarks FROM Landmarks
SELECT * FROM historical_landmarks;
SELECT landmark_name, location FROM historical_landmarks WHERE year_of_establishment < 1900;
SELECT site_name, area_covered FROM preservation_sites ORDER BY site_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM heritage_management WHERE management_type = 'Conservation';
SELECT management_type, start_date FROM heritage_management WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM historical_landmarks WHERE year_of_establishment > 1800;
SELECT site_name, location FROM preservation_sites WHERE area_covered > 50;
SELECT landmark_name, location, year_of_establishment FROM historical_landmarks WHERE year_of_establishment < 1900 ORDER BY year_of_establishment DESC;
SELECT site_name, curator, area_covered FROM preservation_sites WHERE site_id IN (SELECT site_id FROM heritage_management WHERE management_type LIKE 'Conservation%');

SELECT h.management_id, p.site_name, l.landmark_name FROM heritage_management h JOIN preservation_sites p ON h.site_id = p.site_id JOIN historical_landmarks l ON h.landmark_id = l.landmark_id WHERE h.start_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT landmark_name, location FROM Landmarks;
SELECT site_name, preservation_area FROM PreservationSites WHERE preservation_area > 100;
SELECT landmark_name, location, year_established FROM Landmarks ORDER BY year_established DESC;
SELECT * FROM LandmarkDetails WHERE description LIKE '%historic%';
SELECT site_name, location, preservation_area FROM PreservationSites WHERE location = 'National Park';
SELECT * FROM Landmarks;
SELECT landmark_name, year_established FROM Landmarks WHERE year_established > 1800;
SELECT site_name, preservation_area FROM PreservationSites WHERE preservation_area > 1000;
SELECT l.landmark_name, ld.description FROM Landmarks l JOIN LandmarkDetails ld ON l.landmark_id = ld.landmark_id;
SELECT s.site_name, sd.description FROM PreservationSites s JOIN SiteDetails sd ON s.preservation_site_id = sd.preservation_site_id;
SELECT * FROM landmarks;
SELECT name, location FROM landmarks WHERE year_established < 1900;
SELECT id, name, location FROM landmarks ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_events WHERE date BETWEEN '1800-01-01' AND '1900-12-31';
SELECT name, birth_year FROM historical_figures WHERE death_year IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM landmarks WHERE year_established > 1800 ORDER BY year_established DESC;
SELECT name, location FROM preservation_sites WHERE purpose = 'Conservation' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, date FROM historical_events WHERE date BETWEEN '1800-01-01' AND '1900-12-31' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT name, birth_year, death_year FROM historical_figures WHERE death_year IS NOT NULL;
SELECT p.name AS site_name, a.action_name, a.action_date FROM preservation_sites p JOIN preservation_actions a ON p.id = a.site_id WHERE a.action_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
